name: Gangster Mafia - City Battle
description:
Welcome fans of gangster games,
Are you ready to play this Gangster Mafia: City Battle Games? The offline open world games are returning. In this Gangster Mafia: City Battle, you must earn or snatch all the tools, weapons, guns, and cars like lamborghini and other famous car models to become a real gangster. There are hundreds of vehicles, an outrageous arsenal, explosive action, and a complete freestyle environment to explore this crime city. The newest open-world crime game is similar to the gangster game by Regal Battlefield, similar to Real Gangster, Gang war games in terms of action and shooting.

Gangster Mafia: City Battle Games is a rpg in which you can become the city's leader while interacting with criminals and mafia cartels in a free open game environment with gang warfare.
Explore this mafia city with various objectives, box the mafia cartel, fight for the grand reward, and participate in various adventurous crime clans vs the mafia city.
This is an adventure saga about the mafia and gang conflicts. With each update and season, new objectives are added, as well as limited-time activities to participate in. Use guns to win against real gangster mafia and escape police chase in grand gangster games simulator gun shooting games.
This gangster mafia game has street fighting and mafia negotiations, as well as six-gun action missions. Fight-night boxing, street battles whenever and anywhere you like, and various types of city driving with multiple vehicles and traveling throughout this vast environment.
Make your gangster mafia image unique because this is your gangster virtual warrior and he should look stylish in this gangster grand city. You can constantly change your gangsters' appearance. A large clothing store for your own real gangster grand city is available at your gangster service. Some events in this true gangster city grant additional gangster powers.

Game Features

- Extensive special effects and 3D visuals.

- A thrilling simulation of a vehicle thief.

- A variety of weaponry.

- Shop improvements for clothing, weapons, and special transportation

- A sizable map with a variety of tasks.
